roleset.name: take incorrectly, assume incorrectly

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Mr. Arivala said he had mistaken a channel marker at the entrance to the harbor for a lighthouse .
example.arg: a channel marker at the entrance to the harbor

roleset.note: MISTAKE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mistake' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from mistake.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: mess up, fail, make a mistake

example.name: make_mistake-l
example.text: If you make a mistake on your tax return, you should file an amended return to make that correction.

example.name: mistake-n: All args
example.text: Haggerty's notes have the defenseman well aware of his mistake on the winning goal.

example.name: make_mistake-l
example.text: I made the mistake of eating the whole pie.

roleset.note: MISTAKE-N NOTES: Roleset based on comparison to screw.01 (screw up); mistake.01 verb sense (to misunderstand, assume incorrectly) has not arisen in noun instnaces but may need to be added. Framed by Claire. (from mistake.01-n)
